home-page.hostRepo: Online Hosting and Rendering of Markdown Git Repositories
home-page.knowledgeRepo: Personal knowledge repository hosting, not open to the public.
home-page.twoLang: Supports Chinese and English full-text search, quickly find the documents you want.
home-page.tailwindcssSupport: With the support of tailwindcss, all pages are designed in a responsive manner, and your markdown can be viewed beautifully on mobile devices.
home-page.fullTextSearchPSQL: We utilize the full-text search feature of PostgreSQL to provide you with fast and efficient searching.
